description: Aboleths make alliances with illithids more often cities. A relatively large number can be found closer to than with any other lesser race, for two reasons. First, the aboleths the surface. and the illithids have similar mindsets; they’re coldly logical, Aboleths that live near the surface fall into one of three emotionless, and constantly hungry for knowledge. In addition, categories. Some are slavers that live in regions heavily trav- the illithids view all other races as little more than fodder or eled by members of useful slave races (such as humanoids slaves, a viewpoint the aboleths naturally identify with. or giants); these aboleths dwell in small lakes or rivers near Second, the inscrutable mind fl ayers are the race that underground trade routes. Once a slaver aboleth has collected aboleths come the closest to fearing. The aboleths do not its quota of slaves (usually a dozen), it returns with them to remember the genesis of the illithid race, not even in their its home city before coming back to gather more. racial memories. As far as the aboleths know, the illithids Aboleths can also be found near the surface. These indi- simply appeared from nowhere, and that makes the aboleths viduals have been forced to fl ee the deeper cities due to their uncomfortable. The origin and capabilities of the mind fl ayers religious or philosophical beliefs. They seek out others of their are unknown. Of course, the reason for this is simple: Mind kind with like-minded desires and form small communities fl ayers came to the world from the distant future. In a way, of their own. the aboleths and the illithids are like cosmic bookends: two The most commonly encountered aboleths near the surface similar races with similar goals, one from the ancient past and are nomadic members of their race. These aboleths have one from the doomed future. become disillusioned with life in their sunken city, curious
name: Illithids

description: Aboleths are fond of constructs as minions with talented and well-directed slave labor. Aboleth build- because they are completely obedient and impossible for an ings might be composed of brooding, drooping shapes that enemy to charm or control. The aboleths of the grand city of look melted or cancerous, or they might be towering, thin Shaboath even developed a highly specialized form of golem spires with multiple twisted crenellations and jagged spikes. constructed from aboleth mucus; these golems have become All together, an aboleth city looks like discarded shells from popular additions to cities with denizens powerful enough massive prehistoric shellfi sh scattered upon the ocean fl oor. to construct them.
